subject: Seeking additional performance security for the bidders who have quoted abnormally low bid price
text: HRdh <754 rTHFfqfeazrut (Tsw 9de7 er rTAPf HAT4, 4Ra TAFR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) 474a *d 01-5 & 6, #qer-10, ERGT , #/ ferif 110 075 0 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TH/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAIPolicy Guidelines/ Standard Document/2022 Policy Circular No.11.42/2022 dated 13th September, 2022 {Decision taken on e-office file No NHAIICMDIEPC/2O02O (Comp.No. 46753)} Sub: Seeking additional performance security for the bidders who have quoted abnormally low bid reg: MoRTH vide Circular No. NH 37015/01/2022 (Comp No.208778) dated 18.05.2022(Annexure I) made amendments in the RFP of EPC contracts to down how abnormally low bid is to be identified in case of compelling circumstances. MoRTH vide another Circular no  NH 37015/01/2022 (Comp No.208778) dated 18.05.2022 (Annexure- II) extended the waiver of additional performance guarantee in case of  existing contracts. 2  MoRTH now has combined the aforesaid two circulars dated 18.05.2022 vide its Circular No. NH 37015/01/2022 (Comp No.208778) dated 26.08.2022 to remove any ambiguity in the matter_ A copy of the same is attached herewith as Annexure-III for information and implementation: 3. In view of above NHAI Policy Circular no 9.2.35/2022 dated 10.05.2022 on the subject 'Identification of Abnormally Low Bid and seeking of Additional Performance Security /Bank Guarantee (BG) in case of Abnormally Low Bids for EPC Projects' stands withdrawn: 4_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl : As above. (Lt Col Chandan Vatsa, Retd) Chief General Manager (Coord.) To: AlI Officers of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1.
